mapper.select: SELECT id FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND regist_type = #{regist_type}
SELECT password FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, password, name, address, tel, email, nickname, birthday, regist_type) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{regist_type})

INSERT INTO survey(play_rull, play_genre, play_period, play_species, master, want_genre, play_class, other_site, id) VALUES (#{play_rull}, #{play_genre}, #{play_period}, #{play_species}, #{master}, #{want_genre}, #{play_class}, #{other_site}, #{id})
INSERT INTO jwt(access_token, refresh_token, access_token_valid, refresh_token_valid, id) VALUES (#{access_token}, #{refresh_token}, #{access_token_valid}, #{refresh_token_valid}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT refresh_token FROM jwt WHERE access_token = #{access_token} AND jwt_state = 0
SELECT refresh_token_valid FROM jwt WHERE refresh_token = #{refresh_token} AND jwt_state = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE jwt SET jwt_state = 1 WHERE access_token = #{access_token}
